summary: Luton Town Football Club, nicknamed "The Hatters," is a professional team from Luton, England. They play in the EFL Championship, the second-highest league in England, after being relegated from the Premier League in the 2023-24 season. The club has a long history, turning professional in 1885 and joining the Football League in 1897. They've had ups and downs, including multiple relegations and promotions, and even spent time in non-league football due to financial issues. Luton has played at their home stadium, Kenilworth Road, since 1905.
title: Luton Town F.C.
